localization.examples.TwoDPF¶

class localization.examples.TwoDPF(n_particles=100, resampling_type='Random', state_estimation_method='WeightedAverage', resampling_threshold=0)¶

Bases: nonparameteric.ParticleFilter

__init__(n_particles=100, resampling_type='Random', state_estimation_method='WeightedAverage', resampling_threshold=0)¶

Constructor.

Methods

Constructor.

estimate_states()

Method used to determine the navigation fix or solution of the particle filter based on the estimation method specified.

get_highest_weighted_particle()

Returns highest weighted particle.

get_sum_weight()

Returns the sum of the weights of the particle field.

get_sum_weight_squared()

Returns the sum of the squares of the particles' weights.

Used to initialize the particle field.

Resample particles using multinomial method

Normailzes the weights of all particles to [0.0, 1.0)

Private abstract method used to propagate the particle field.

Resample particles randomly with replacement using NumPy

This method calls the specified resampling method of the particle filter.

residual_resample()

Resample particles using residual method

step([Input, Observations])

Used to run a single cycle of the particle filter algorithm

Private method used to update the weights of the particles based on measurements recieved.

update_weight(particle, observations)

Private abstract method for the measurement or observation model.
estimate_states()¶

Method used to determine the navigation fix or solution of the particle filter based on the estimation method specified.

get_highest_weighted_particle()¶

Returns highest weighted particle.

get_sum_weight()¶

Returns the sum of the weights of the particle field. When normalized this should be equal to 1.0

get_sum_weight_squared()¶

Returns the sum of the squares of the particles’ weights.

initialize(method='about', resampling_noise=0, **kwargs)¶

Used to initialize the particle field.

Parameters

  • method (string) – initializaiton method description; currently available are: “about”, “fixed”, and “uniform”.

  • resampling_noise (float or array of floats) – noise or “jitter” added to the particle state on resampling.

multinomial_resample()¶

Resample particles using multinomial method

normalize_weights()¶

Normailzes the weights of all particles to [0.0, 1.0)

propagate(particle, Input=None)¶

Private abstract method used to propagate the particle field. Should be overridden in specific sub-class implementation.

random_resample()¶

Resample particles randomly with replacement using NumPy

resample()¶

This method calls the specified resampling method of the particle filter.

residual_resample()¶

Resample particles using residual method

step(Input=None, Observations=None)¶

Used to run a single cycle of the particle filter algorithm

Parameters

  • Input (array-like, converted to numpy array in method) – control input vector

  • Observation (array-like, converted to numpy array in method) – observation or measurment vector

update(observations)¶

Private method used to update the weights of the particles based on measurements recieved.

update_weight(particle, observations)¶

Private abstract method for the measurement or observation model.
